reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be of good quality, comfortable, and soft, with one mentioning it's loose enough for all-day wear. The dress is flattering, hugging all the right places, and is particularly suitable for baby showers. The material thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's not super thick. The slit receives negative feedback, with multiple customers finding it too high. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, comfortable dress
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I ordered the dress for a Christmas party and absolutely love it. It’s worn here without shape wear and is still very flattering. I love the slit up the leg, which gives it an eye catching look while still showing elegance. The material is thick and warm and a good length. I initially ordered in ivory and the material was see-through. I ended up ordering in the Coffee color and it is not see-through. I am 5‘7“ and 140 to 145 lbs. I am typically between a size small and medium. I ordered a medium and I’m very happy with the fit. Read more
items.author: Chelsea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!!
items.body: Not too thick, but super forgiving and very flattering. I’ve received many compliments on the dress and it fit as expected. Read more
items.author: McKenna Purves

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress!
items.body: Perfect Dress for a Baby Shower! I absolutely love this white sweater dress! It’s so soft, cozy, and comfortable—perfect for a baby shower. The fit is flattering, and the material is thick enough to keep me warm without being too bulky. The dress has just the right amount of stretch, making it easy to move around in, and it looks elegant yet casual. I received so many compliments, and it was a great choice for the occasion. Highly recommend this dress for anyone looking for something stylish, comfortable, and perfect for a special event like a baby shower! Read more
items.author: Kelsey McClain

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well
items.body: This is just a really beautiful classy sweater dress. It washes great I do have to run a lint brush over it after tho. I wore it to my graduation and I’d be able to wear it out to dinner it’s really versatile. Perfect length and the slit up the side is a nice peekaboo of the thigh. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great winter dress
items.body: Bought this dress for my baby shower. I first bought an xl but it was too big. I was 7 months pregnant and about 210lbs. I returned and got a size large. This was a perfect fit. It was comfortable, cute, and warm for my December baby shower. The material was thick and soft with a lot of stretch. Read more
items.author: Abby lupo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Neck not snug
items.body: Quality of material seems nice enough but the neck is stretched out and the slit goes kind of high up the leg, a little higher than I would like. Read more
items.author: M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater dress
items.author: SBW

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Rust, Ivory, Purple, Darkblue, Lightblue, Apricot, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
